resources.string: Find out if you are invisible enough online, to others and what your current status is
Hello, this is instant app feature
Are you sure you want to exit?
(You should make all levels invisible to be incognito 100%)
Do you want to open Location settings to enable location services? Without WiFi Access Points will not be detected. Click on Dialog to continue
You should make all of those items invisible to be completely anonymous.
You are anonymous, no one sees you at the moment.

Avoid using unprotected Bluetooth and WiFi networks while in public. Sometimes, these connections are unsecured and there’s no way of telling how safe a network is when you’re on the go. A good practice is to disable your Bluetooth and WiFi if you aren’t using these services. Studies suggest that enabling these features makes it easier for hackers to get into your devices.
If you never connect your computer, you are 100 percent safe from hackers on the internet. There is no way someone can hack and retrieve, alter or monitor information without physical access.

If you want your secured information protected, airplane mode is a great way to temporarily isolate your phone from malevolent hackers. It limits your device’s connection to unsecured public networks and hides you from hackers.
